name: UQM Mods
short_description:
The UQM-Mods project is a collection of 3 mods that allow players to "enhance" gameplay or to add features that were otherwise unavailable. These mods are a collaboration between me and a few members of the UQM community.

You can also find miscellaneous things like the 3DO videos from Star Control II, the Japanese voice set, victory ditties for your phone, and Comm music remasters I created.
